name: Controller
description: Graph Controller contract. Controller is a registry of contracts for convenience. Inspired by Livepeer: https://github.com/livepeer/protocol/blob/streamflow/contracts/Controller.sol.

eventDecorators.name: NewOwnership
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user funds are withdrawn from the rollup.

eventDecorators.name: NewPauseGuardian
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user funds are withdrawn from the rollup.

eventDecorators.name: NewPendingOwnership
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user funds are withdrawn from the rollup.

eventDecorators.name: PartialPauseChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user funds are withdrawn from the rollup.

eventDecorators.name: PauseChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user funds are withdrawn from the rollup.

eventDecorators.name: SetContractProxy
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when user funds are withdrawn from the rollup.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Admin function for pending governor to accept role and update governor. This function must called by the pending governor.

functionDecorators.name: getContractProxy
functionDecorators.description: Get contract proxy address by its id.

functionDecorators.name: partialPaused
functionDecorators.description: Getter to access partial pause status.

functionDecorators.name: setContractProxy
functionDecorators.description: Register contract id and mapped address.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Contract id (keccak256 hash of contract name).

functionDecorators.name: setPartialPaused
functionDecorators.description: Change the partial paused state of the contract Partial pause is intended as a partial pause of the protocol.

parameterDecorators.name: _newPauseGuardian
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new Pause Guardian.

functionDecorators.name: setPaused
functionDecorators.description: Change the paused state of the contract Full pause most of protocol functions.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Admin function to begin change of governor. The `_newGovernor` must call `acceptOwnership` to finalize the transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Contract id (keccak256 hash of contract name).

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: Contract id (keccak256 hash of contract name).
